prompt:
AI-Powered Code Review System - Enterprise Strategic Analysis

Project Context:
- Complexity Score: 85.0%
- Think Level: megathink
- Existing Codebase: MCP-based AI coding assistant
- Integration Requirements: GitHub API, AI Models, Learning System

Perform comprehensive multi-dimensional analysis:

1. TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE (30%)
   - Microservices vs Monolithic considerations
   - Event-driven vs Request-response patterns
   - AI model orchestration strategy
   - Data pipeline architecture

2. BUSINESS VALUE ANALYSIS (20%)
   - ROI projections and metrics
   - Time-to-market optimization
   - Competitive advantage assessment
   - User adoption strategies

3. SECURITY & COMPLIANCE (25%)
   - Code review security implications
   - Data privacy considerations
   - Audit trail requirements
   - Access control strategies

4. PERFORMANCE & SCALABILITY (25%)
   - Real-time processing requirements
   - Caching strategies
   - Load balancing approaches
   - Database optimization needs

Provide concrete, actionable recommendations with:
- Specific technology choices
- Implementation priorities
- Risk mitigation strategies
- Success metrics and KPIs
